Richard Wajman

Games developer, photographer & artist

Achieving a 2:2 in Games Development at University of West London, I have aspiration of applying my creativity and knowledge directly towards the Gaming industry. I strive to achieve my goals with a strong drive and take pride in my work as well as having excellent interpersonal skill and working in a team-orientated environment.

Skills: 3D Modeling, Rigging, UV Mapping, Music Engineering, Producing, Games Design, Texturing, Photography and Video editing.
